name: scroll
description: charmingScroll是一款小型的jquery滑动条插件 * 插件是基于jquery的，需先引入jquery，再进入charmingScroll文件 ```javascript <script type="text/javascript" src="bower_components/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js"></script> <script type="text/javascript" src="public/js/jquery.charmingScroll.js"></script> ```
